Chapter.Name: CHARTER OF THE UNITED NATIONS AND STATUTE OF THE INTERNATIONAL COURT OF JUSTICE

ExternalData.Subtitlesect: Amendment to Article 109 of the Charter of the United Nations, adopted by the General Assembly of the United Nations in resolution 2101 (XX) of 20 December 1965

EIF.Label: Entry into force
EIF.Labeltext: 12 June 1968, in accordance with article 108 for all Members of the United Nations.
